outputs.output_descr:
1. Dynamic, long-term planning mechanisms to cope with the inherent uncertainties of climate change introduced, with a focus on managing flood risk. 2. Namibian leadership and institutional frameworks to manage climate change risks and opportunities in an integrated manner strengthened, including a decentralised approach.3. Climate-resilient policies and measures in priority sectors implemented (flooding and settlement/ sanitation and health) and promoting community-based adaptation action. 4.Financing options to meet national adaptation costs expanded at the local and national level and building on I & FF work ongoing
5.	Knowledge on adjusting national development processes to fully incorporate climate change risks and opportunities generated and shared across all levels

project_descr: NAM Africa Adapt Prj:  Building a National Approach to Climate Change Adaptation (CCA) in Namibia (2009-2012)).
project_title: Building Foundation for Climate Change Adaptation
